ovdesc.p: Each clearing system has their prescribed file format for Outward & Inward claim submission and return.
Incoming claims can be processed directly using a local Accounting interface without creating DD.ITEM.

However for future reference, claim details are required then the using a local interface, which should deconstruct the incoming file with the details as given in DD.IN.FORMAT and map the same to DD.ITEM.

Hence in this application, the field name related to DD.ITEM along with the field position in incoming file from which the details to be taken can be given . Also routine can be attached to populate the values which is not available in the incoming claim file.

desc.p: If FIELD.DELIMITER is blank then this field indicates the starting position for the data to be extracted.
If FIELD.DELIMITER is set then this field indicates the field number for the delimiter.
Mandatory field
1-5 Numeric characters

The delimiter used to deconstruct the data from the inward file contents. If the field is blank, then the DATA.LENGTH becomes mandatory. If the delimiter is repesent as <NNN>, then it indicates that the delimiter is specified in ASCII character and the given value inside the bracket is used as CHARX(NNN) during decoding of data.
Optional field
1-5 characters
Describes a DD Inward format file and same is used as an enrichment when it is referred in other application.
Descriptions may be entered in each of the languages defined in the LANGUAGE table.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input)
When the incoming file has multi values and this field can be used to specify the multi value no to which the data can be mapped.
Optional field
1-5 Alphanumeric Characters
When the incoming file has Sub values and this field can be used to specify the Sub value numer to which the data can be mapped.
Optional field
1-5 Alphanumeric Characters
The id to this application is a clearing system which is defined in DD.REASON.CODES application.
This can be linked to DD.PARAMETER in inward file format field. However local interface has to be used to deconstruct the incoming claim file details.
Mandatory field
Must be a valid record in DD.REASON.CODES.
Specify the field name to which this data to be mapped. Currently the details can be mapped to DD.ITEM hence it should contain a valid field name from DD.ITEM.
Mandatory field
Should be a valid field name in DD.ITEM.
If FIELD.DELIMITER is blank, then this field indicates the length of the data to be mapped to DD.ITEM.
If FIELD.DELIMITER is present, then this field is insignificant.
Optional field
1-5 Numeric character
Specify the routine which should be used to populate the field value in DD.ITEM
The routine given here should be prefixed with "@".
Optional field
Should be a valid record in PGM.FILE
Routine should be cataloged and VOC pointer should be available.
